title: Aria's Song
description: The future is a very different place with technological and biological engineering leading the way to a different world ever imagined before. In this future, the newly reestablished U.S. government is being protected by a covert psychic organization, the Guardians who are directed by the brilliant leadership of Shield Council. Patriots across the country have fought back and ousted the unbalanced man before he could do more harm to the overall population. But it's an ongoing battle. A battle that the Guardians fight every day.In this premiere book of the series, Aria Wind has been betrayed by her partner given into the hands of a ragtag group who sought to get answers she wasn't willing to give them. Drugged and beaten, she plans her own rescue as her psychic powers come back into her control.Taylor MacKay and his partner, Thorne Cole, along with their Guardian Companions, arrive to find the rest of the team missing and Aria captured by a group of mercenaries. Follow along as they fight against the odds to find love in the midst of betrayal and unknown obstacles.Amazing heroes of the future - Incredible men, women, and animals with unbelievable powers put their lives on the line day in and day out to stop a dictatorial billionaire and his mercenaries attempting to force their way back in control of the government.CONTENT WARNING: Explicit sex, graphic language, and some violence.
author: R.   Beach
